snippet: The 23-year-old sergeant, who said he had been bullied, attacked soldiers in his unit with a rifle and a hand grenade in June.
abstract: South Korean Army sergeant, identified only by his surname Yim, is sentenced to death for killing five soldiers in his unit and wounding seven others in shooting rampage in June 2014.
lead_paragraph: The 23-year-old sergeant, who said he had been bullied, attacked soldiers in his unit with a rifle and a hand grenade in June.

headline.main: South Korean Who Killed 5 Fellow Soldiers Is Sentenced to Die
headline.print_headline: South Korea: Soldier Sentenced to Die
